Gorgeous little dress and it did fit, but was too short for my taste (I'm 5'8"). It also was a little too tight on the bottom and too loose on top- which is often a problem I have ( wear size 4 tops/6 bottoms).

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: This was super cute on, but definitely not something I'd wear every day. I wore it for a party, but it wasn't the comfiest thing I've ever worn. Still super cute though!

It’s not a significant amount larger, but if you are in between a couple of sizes, I would go for the smaller choice! Loved the petite options as well!

I'm a bit curvy in my lower half, so have to size up when wearing a straight-cut shift dress. The 8 fit my lower half well without completely drowning out my top! I got lots of compliments and it was so comfy on a hot day. Bonus: no bra necessary! (32D)
Great fit! Easy to dress up or down.
Perfect summer dress. The embroidery is very well done. The fit was great! I wore it to work and out at the beach and received many compliments
Fits as expected. Petite friendly. Runs smaller in chest for larger bust

I like this dress a lot! The turquoise stitching is so pretty. I found this to be pretty true to size except for the top portion which was a little snug, I am a 34C and it was a tad tight. But it could still work with a thin bra or even better, no bra at all :)

I love this dress, it's adorable and has many uses - definitely high quality and unique. My only concern is that it's a bit loose at the bust. Perhaps due to the cut, I found myself floating up top but everywhere else fit. The dress can still be worn and looks cute, but just for my size (34B) it was a bit looser than I'd like.

I didn’t like this dress. The style and fabric seem to be at odds. I’d have expected cotton for this boho pattern and halter maxi style. They shiny fabric is more evening wear IMO. Also, there is a seam running around the skirt about mid thigh that makes it baggy around the middle in an unflattering way.
Never received

links_reviews_title: Fun print, fit wasn't right for me
links_reviews_text: Rented this for warm vacay - but unfortunately the fit in chest, specifically elastic top, was too large for me (currently 34D thanks to pregnancy!). The fabric was different than I expected too - shiny and not as casual as hoping. Ended up not wearing - I maybe needed a size 4... Has potential for fun warm weather dress!
I loved the fabric and the print, wish it would have fit but it was right around my rib cage. Still may have worked but it was also way too small in the bust.
Fits well and very comfortable. The material was shiny - not what I expected, but I liked it!

links_reviews_title: Does not fit as it looks like it will from the pictures.
links_reviews_text: This dress looks long and flowy in the picture, it say tight on the hips and short on my person.
This was a very cute summer maxi that fit well and works for a number of occasions.

I loved this dress, I would say I could have gone with a 12 but i'm between a 12 and 14 and wanted it to fit no matter what so I sized up. I would say it's true to size and fit pretty well, maybe a tiny bit bigger than normal. The material was really nice and it was a perfect beach dress.
Pretty dress for evening out. Make sure to size down as the top is a bit over sized.
Liked this dress a lot. The detailed back was beautiful on. It was longer than I expected, I'm 5'8 so I don't think this would work as well for someone who is not quite as tall.

Especially if you are plus sized, this dress looks absolutely stunning on. I got sooo many compliments in this dress. I’ll probably order again on my next nuuly and buy it. The fabric is so light weight and just feels amazing on your skin. I love the petite floral print and you can definitely dress it up.
comfy, cute, love the pockets and cutouts on the back.
The back poofed out a bit with me, which detracted from the nice design otherwise. Nice and comfy for my walks and looked fine.
This dress fit perfect and the detail on the back made me LOVE it. Unfortunately, I rented it during the COVID pandemic so I was unable to wear it.
A little too fitted and fabric with no stretch. Plus sized ladies need a little stretch!

I got tons of compliments in this dress, which I wore in Mexico and also at work. The buttons on the skirt let you change up the styling which made this an excellent piece. Pockets, cute back, and a good length. What's not to like!
Flattering
Wore this many times during my vacation. Very cute for the beach. It is a lot of fabric so slightly awkward when you tie it. But generally an amazing dress that’s very chic
I’m about 5’5” and a size 4, this dress was not flattering on me and I tried to wear it a few times but never felt comfortable that it was flattering due to length.
Super comfortable and pretty. Details on the bag were gorgeous. Could wear with pants and without. Overall really easy to wear and love pockets!

This was very pretty. The top was not very flattering on me though. The way the sleeves cap made my arms look fat. I love the print and flow on the bottom. Maybe I’d try it again with a jacket or sweater over it.
A little big in the shoulders. Has pockets. Nicely lined. If you want the back detail to show you can't wear a bra.
This dress surprised me. I thought it was cute but did not expect the way it looked in. It fits and flatters the body while being light and effortless for work or play.

links_reviews_title: P O C K E T S
links_reviews_text: "thanks, it has pockets!" - this dress is super cute and fits true to size. Very flattering how it pulls in my waist.
Absolutely loved this item. I buttoned it all the way down to wear to work but then styled it with jeans for a night out. Wore it a ton in the month I rented it.
Flattering dress but it runs long, I am 5'4' and the petit is the perfect length.

I wanted to love this so much, and tried a few times to wear it. It was too tight in my bust, and large everywhere else. There's also a lot more fabric than it looks like. It's so cute, but if you have a bigger chest, this may be tough to wear :(
The most effortless dress. Wore it to work. Wore it on a trip. Wore it on a date. Dress her up, dress her down, feel great! Bust area is very modest.
This dress is awesome. It can be more casual and worn with sandals and jeans underneath or can be dressed up with heels and some nice jewelry. I also love that it has pockets!

I really love this dress- I am 5" 7" and can wear it with either flats or heels. I also wore it over jeans as shown in the picture and it was really cute. It has pocket, which is always nice. The size 6 fit me really well (I typically wear a 4-6 in dresses).
bright, casual dress with good lining and pockets. Was flattering and was able to skip the bra.

I really liked this dress - and the petite length was perfect for me. My only thing was the front was noticeably longer than the back when hanging but once you got it on it wasn’t as noticeable (I don’t think?).

I wore this to the Phoenix Open golf tournament. The pockets are huge and super helpful for a day party scenario where you don't want to (or in my case, weren't allowed to) carry a big purse. Super flattering for ladies with hips/butt, and the top part is stretchy.
Wore this on Bahamas vacation; the color, material and fit were beautiful. Made my waist look great and got lots of complimentS
Cute sundress! Wore it on a beach vacation. A-line fit really nice. The material was a little heavy For where I live so I didn’t purchase. But very pretty
Weird
Super comfy & perfect for vacation. Love the colors!
I loved the fit and color. I almost kept it but I found it much cheaper at Anthropologie.

This dress was a bit lackluster for me. The colors in person were very pretty, but there was so much fabric on the bottom portion of the dress that I felt I looked like I was drowning in fabric. Also, it does form the "v" look that you see in the photo, so keep that in mind. In the end I didn't end up wearing this since I didn't feel it was the most flattering.

I was browsing for a few summer dresses to wear on vacation at the beach, something casual and I thought this would be perfect! It's really pretty and fun, the top part fits like a glove, I didn't even have to re-tie the halter portion. The bottom half is OK, there is quite a bit of fabric at the bottom and the picture of the model is accurate where the front portion almost folds in the middle-front to look like a jumpsuit. I didn't notice this before ordering so when I tried it on I was a little disheartened because extra fabric on the bottom of anything doesn't really flatter my figure, but I think I could make this work once or twice in the month that I have it.

This dress was so comfortable to wear during the heat wave! It is well made and has silicone tape along the inside top edge to keep it in place. The drawstring at the front bodice is adjustable to change the neckline to your liking. It fits true to size and I received loads of compliments all day!

links_reviews_title: Would not recommend this at all
links_reviews_text: Really poor quality - see through and very thin fabric, seems like it's form forever 21. Rented it but didn't even use it. :(

This dress looked exactly as pictured. It fits a little potato sack like and almost has a pajama look to it. A belt might help depending on your body type - didn't help for me. The sleeves are really cool and I did end up wearing this one evening.
Fit fine, but didn't do anything for me. never wore it.
Gorgeous fabric, felt very secure, just nothing to write home about regarding fit and overall impression.

I wore this dress on vacation in flordia. It is comfortable, breezy, and the lace cutouts on the sleeves are so pretty. Only detracting a star because it's pretty thin and see-through which makes undergarments a bit of a challenge.
Fits as expected

This dress appeared darker and more solid in the pictures than when it came, but I probably loved it best from everything in my box. Things to know that might not being apparent: This dress is made of jersey fabric, so it's like a thick partially stretch t-shirt fabric. Because of that i's very forgiving. It also has a lining. which gives it more movement, body, and a nice weight. However, because it's jersey, it has the power to fade... and my dress looked pretty worn. It was more dark grey than black, but it's a testament to the dress that it was still comfy and gorgeous. Also there is boning on the sides of the torso. The boning gives the dress just a bit of structure where it's needed most, and it contributes to the retro vibe of the dress.

I wore my usual padded bra with this and it fit perfectly. Has a slip to help with gusts of wind! Didn't buy mine because it looked like it was already well loved, but it would still be fun for the beach!
I am petite and wear a 32 bra band and this was way too tight on me. Pretty dress, wish it fit, definitely size up!
Wore this for a dinner party in Maui - perfection! Fit like a glove, very flattering.
I wore this to dinner out in Hawaii a couple of times. It was a little large in the bust but workable.
Loved this dress, just never ended up having the occasion and weather to wear it. May try again in the spring.
Really cute print, but the straps were too long and it my chest look flatter than it is. Really comfy though.

I wanted to love this dress, but it was just not going to happen for me. The fabric was chunky and not too flattering, and the straps were so long I had to tie them with a hair tie. I think it would work better on a straight body type for a casual occasion

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my beach vaction
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It was very comfortable, fit really well, and looked great with a jean jacket over it. The actually dress I received was not in the best condition, but I would love to buy this if it was brand new.

It was hard to get this dress on and off. I've had kids and the bust wasn't ideal to hold up the girls-even with a strapless bra. I liked the fabric and print and the flare of the skirt, but it just didn't work for me.
I really liked this dress but it needed a bra, no built in support and was difficult to match with one. I have a large bust, so word of caution to well endowed women.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a warm night out
links_reviews_text: I only got the chance to wear this out once, but it was pretty stunning while still being comfortable. I wouldn't recommend trying to wear this on a super hot day, but a warm night out was perfect. I paired it with platform wedges and it was the perfect length with lots of fun swing.
Super comfy and stretchy. Loved it!
This fabric is so heavy I felt clunky in it. Wouldn't stand the Texas heat so never wore it. Lovely print though, so sad it didn't work out.

If I were a bit taller, had more narrow shoulders and skinnier, this would have fit perfectly. So take note on dimensions! There was a lot of fabric for my frame and it swallowed me up. The print is super cute but the material looks nicer in the photo than in real life.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, can dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Soft jersey dress, perfect for day or night- flats or dressy Sandals!
This style is better for smaller busted people. I wish the straps were adjustable to give me more support but it’s a great pattern and fun shape.

The fabric is like T-Shirt fabric which was a bit unexpected. i am a 34B and the top was tight. The print was really beautiful. The skirt was full and fun to walk it. If it had fit better I would of probably kept it.
Loved this dress. Super comfortable and flattering. Wish the straps were adjustable for a slightly better fit. Great length for not so tall girls.

Loved this dress-it was super comfortable and highlighted all the right curves in my hourglass figure. My only complaint was it needed a zipper-it was a workout putting the dress on and taking it off.
Very cute and received many compliments!
This dress is super easy to dress up or down depending on the occasion! It's pretty stretchy so the bustline was a bit lower than I would have liked. Cute tie at the waist for a cinched look.
This dress is super cute but, holy cow, it made my chest look HUGE. The sweetheart neckline combined with the ruching was just too much. Otherwise, material is soft and the pattern is cute.

I adore this dress. It was flowy and comfortable and super flattering! Plus, the wrinkles fell right out after I put it on. The straps are not adjustable. The shirred portion at the chest and the thicker fabric provide great nipple coverage.

This one didn't work for me. I'm usually a Medium in a jersey dress, but this one was very tight in the bust (I'm a 36C). The way it is made there just isn't a ton of give in the bodice like you would expect from a jersey-knit dress. I'm between sizes and should have gone with my larger size. The print is very cute.
Oh, my sweet heavens. Super cute. This might be my favorite item from my first shipment. I plan on layering this dress. It is versatile and flattering, besides being stinking cute.

This dress would have been perfect if the bodice had been a bit looser. I love the colors, style, and material. But the structure of the top cut into my underarms and back in an unflattering, somewhat uncomfortable way. I probably should have picked the size up. Even so, I liked the dress so much that I still wore it paired with a cardigan to hide the ill-fitting top.

This dress was really pretty in person, I just felt it didn't work well with my body type so I didn't end up wearing it. It has a lot of stretch in the fabric, and it's a very versatile dress that you can easily dress up or down. As another reviewer said, the straps are not adjustable so they were long for me.

I loved this dress, it was super comfortable, loved the cut of it too. The only thing I can say is that the straps are a bit long, so it sits a bit low, but I still really liked it. I styled it with cute pink sneakers for a dressed down vibe.
I loved this dress, I almost kept it. The detail of the fabric was beautiful.
I'd hoped to wear this dress on a trip to Bonaire but unless you enjoy looking like a adult trying desperately - and poorly - to pass as a 12-year-old, I'd recommend skipping this one.

Too bad, this was the only piece I ordered I could not wear.

I like this dress for this month
Beautiful

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but a little too shapeless
links_reviews_text: The dress itself is beautiful with intricate detailing on the shoulders. Even with my normal size though, it was still fairly large in the bust and waist area. This will be a great choice if you like an extra billowy fit.
Can’t say how much I loved this so pretty !
Loved it so much I bought it! The second I walked down the stairs my husband said I should buy it!
i loooooved this, the colors, the pattern mix, the straps in the back, everything. truly a stunner!
Absolutely adored this dress. Wore for over 12 hours at a music festival. Lots of compliments and easy to dance and move around in.

Wore this in Mexico and it was absolutely STUNNING. Definitely a show-stopper dress for a special occasion, or you know, just running errands if you're like that. I sized down one size and this was perfectly snug. There is a zipper on the side to help not get tangled up in the straps when you put it on. I am 5'8 and wore with flats - was barely grazing the ground.
Love the high neckline and colorful print. I could wear this all year round!

I recently had a baby so I’ve been using Nuuly to have a lot more selection in clothing while my size is transitioning. It paired best with leather booties and a denim jacket (also from Nuuly).
This dress was AMAZING!!!
Got compliments on this one. I didn’t realize it had a zipper on the side and I was still able to get it on and have it feel appropriately fitted. Very nice.
I was a little hesitant on this dress given the reviews, however the straps weren't long on me at all. I'm 5'7" though and do have a long torso. This dress is adorable! Perfect for a beach dinner!
Patterns were a little much for me!

links_reviews_title: I would wear this everyday if I could
links_reviews_text: Ugh, I probably should have purchased this. ;) I got SO MANY compliments every time I wore this dress. Love the embroidery and the back is so beautiful. I wore this to work, out, everywhere and anywhere I could. I was able to go down to a size 4, which fit my top perfectly. Given that there's more room in the hips, the size 4 is perfect. I typically wear a size 28/6 in bottoms, but in flare dresses, I can get away with a 4. For reference, I wear a 34b bra, so fairly small on top, more curvy on the bottom.

I rented the petite version and it was still really long. I had to wear heels that were at least 3", and even then, it was to the ground. The pattern on the dress is fun, but I did put a belt on just to break it up a bit. Really nice fabric and seems well-made.
Super pretty and lightweight. Perfect for summer.

I am a 36H/ 5'2" and 173lbs size 14 and this dress worked very well for me. I think the straps were not an issue of being too loose, as the boob situation countered the long crisscross back. I liked that I could wear a normal bra with it as it also has regular straps in addition to the crisscross. Very comfortable just a tad too long, had to wear with some taller booties and I paired with a jeans jacket.
I enjoyed wearing this for dinner on a beach layover in San Juan. It was comfy and cute and received a few compliments.
Perfect flowing comfortable dress

Such a unique piece! Got tons of compliments. It fit perfectly in the small, and though it was long, I was happy to wear it with chunky blue platforms or velvet wine colored heeled booties. Lots of colors you can pick up on and options for styling which actually makes it quite versatile. Wore it to work with a blazer and a few other times out and about!

This is a beautiful dress. I'm 5'3 & 112 pounds and this fit perfectly. I wanted it to be a little more cinched at the waist so I always wore it with a black or tan belt. The length was perfect and so was the fit around the shoulders and back. I felt great wearing this dress and received many questions asking where it was from.

I loved wearing this dress - great late summer/early fall transitional piece. I'm only 5'5 and wore comfortably barefoot and with a low chunk heel. A little roomy in the sizing but better than too tight.
Unique and flattering, but straps were wayyy too long. If I rent again I’ll size down. Photos don’t do the embroidery justice!

This is such a lovely dress! I got so many compliments, and truthfully, it felt like wearing socially acceptable sweatpants ;) (the ruffles are conveniently placed so you don't have to wear a bra...bonus!!!!)
I absolutely loved this dress! It's so unique and gorgeous. So many colors and prints to look at. It was comfortable and a perfect fit. I wore it twice!
This was a super fun and comfy dress to wear for my birthday. It's busy, but so unique and gorgeous! I got a lot of compliments.

This is such a gorgeous dress! I was super disappointed when I tried it on and it did not fit my rib cage. I know that my torso is freakishly long and wide but I thought I ordered a big enough size to accommodate that. I do recommend this dress, just not for me.
Fit tts for petite with some room due to stretchy side panels on the back. Length is perfect on me for petite. Can easily dress down with denim jacket. Got tons of compliments on this beauty.
I was able to wear it with flat shoes, but could have done heels as well. The material was good quality. Easy to wear.

Love this dress! It is long. I am 5'3, on the cusp of being petite or regular. I usually go with regular rather than petite but I think I should have wnet petite for this one. The ruffles on the top seemed like too much but once I had it on it worked. Wish I had a pic to share! Next time!
Wore this dress for a very special night out. It's super fun and fit like a glove!

I ended up purchasing this from the store, one of my favorite dresses of the year! I got tons of compliments. It hit a little above the floor on my 5'7" frame, and I was comfortable in my normal size. I added a slim brown belt. The embroidery is lovely (though it was a bit frayed out of the box), and the back detail with crossed ruffle straps made it unique. Love!
Love this dress! I’m between a 4 and a 6, the 4 fit perfectly. Length was perfect for a flat sandal.
So unique, beautiful and comfortable! The fit was great.
This runs big on top and under the arms. It has stretch in the back so can work for a larger bust. I added a belt for more structure.
So pretty!!! If the discount was better on this one I would have kept it. Really lovely and unique piece.
A showstopper dress. Beautiful pattern and fit.

links_reviews_title: Fun & Unique Dress: Top Not Proportionate to size
links_reviews_text: I was in love with this dress from the first time I saw it online and it looks even more gorgeous in person. The top of the dress hit me in the middle of my bust line. It almost seemed like the top of the dress was not sized the same as the bottom.

This fit like a glove and was so comfy! I got many compliments while wearing this - and I'll wear it multiple times in the month I have it! It's not too busy of a print/design, it's beautiful - and it can be casual with a jean jacket and sandals or dressed up with wedges and a clutch!
I really like wearing this dress and received lots of compliments
This dress is very flattering, but the short sleeves are way to tight.

Easy to wear, but it may be too thick for warmer weather. It was perfect for a mild spring day. I love this dress so much. I felt like I was on my way to my own hippie wedding. I paired it with cowboy boots to dress it down a bit. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress if you are c or below
links_reviews_text: This dress is really lovely, unable to wear this due to my chest. Like anyone above a D don’t even think about it. One star off for kind of weird length but the detail on the sleeves and bust, the print etc are really pretty!
The dress looks better in the picture. It was too heavy to wear for summer.
Was not for me but I have to say that it was so well made and fit beautifully. Just wasn't my style - much fussier than it appears.
This dress is very nice. It fits and drops nicely.
Wanted to wear this to an event on Florida but it was so heavy and not very flowy

The embroidery on this dress is really pretty, but the fabric is very heavy. On my short, curvy frame the dress alone looked like a vintage Renaissance fair gown. I had to add a belt, a lightweight cardi & simple jewelry to tone down the wench-y look. It was not a look I could manage to make office appropriate. I also had a hard time keeping all the little hook & eye fasteners closed at my bust. It wasn't too tight, but they would randomly wiggle apart!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but sleeves too tight
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty and I was hugely disappointed when it didn't fit. I had selected it to wear for my 10 year wedding anniversary, but when I got it and tried it on it fit everywhere except for the sleeves. There was nothing I could do to make this work. I do have larger upper-arms and there is no stretch to the sleeve at all, so I could not wear this. If you have skinny arms this will probably fit you nicely though, it just didn't work well for me.

In person, this dress just doesn't have the same feeling as the photo. I know that's vague but it feels a bit more muted and matronly in person. The fabric is super thick in person and kind of just hung on me in a way that didn't have the flow-y, billowy vibe I thought it would. It didn't fit well to my waist so I felt like it did nothing for my body. The shoulders were kind of tight too, which was odd since it was still so loose on the waist, I wouldn't want to size down for that reason. I see photos on here of other people and they look super cute in it! It was just a miss for me with my fair coloring I felt pretty washed out, the proportions weren't quite right for my body, and the fabric was really thick.
Wonderful for a fancy dinner with the family. Very appreciative that the top could accommodate a large chest. Felt amazing to wear and twirl around in. I'll cherish birthday memories in this!
Really wanted to like this dress, but it just didn't work for me. There was SO MUCH fabric, and it was really thick. The sleeves also felt a bit cheap and scratchy. It was a no for me!

Lovely dress with great details. Colors are more muted in person and the dress is shorter than I thought. It hits me in the same place as the model, though I'm only 5'4" and have to get petite to get a similar fit in other items. It is fairly wide, but I was able to add a leather belt and you couldn't really tell it was slightly big on me.
This dress was just too much - the fabric and design overwhelmed my shape and I could never find the right time to wear it.

I was over the moon when I got this dress in my Nuuly box-it is such a beautiful dress! Can really easily be dressed up or down. I wore it to work and to a family party and got so many compliments! It is so flattering and comfy-the only thing that would have made this perfect would be pockets! My one small qualm is that the top hook in the front pulled a bit-sometimes coming undone when I sat. Not a huge deal but can be a dealbreaker for those who like to keep it conservative.
This kind of looked and felt like a window curtain. I didn't feel cute and spring-y like I thought it looked in the pictures.

I love this dress so much that I bought it! The fit is perfect. The material is a little heavier but I didn't find this an issue with the Summer heat - the sleeves are also lace which makes it feel lighter. Only downside is that it wrinkles somewhat easily.
Paired it with sandals and dangle earring and was good to go. A little on the the heavy side with the full lining but absolutely love the floral print.

Love this classic fit and cut dress. It runs true to size, it delightfully flattering, and incredibly comfortable. I wore it to a morning function and then drove five hours in it and still did not want to take it off.

This dress has all the details- beautiful lace sleeves, an appliqued bodice and a romantic floral print. I'm tall and it hit midi length on me. There is a zip closure at the side for easily getting the dress on and clip closures in front.
I thought this dress was very pretty and fit very well. Friendly for petites and also friendly for nursing because there are bust closures.

links_reviews_title: Practical Everyday Romance- I'm in Love!
links_reviews_text: It's hard to find an off-shoulder number you can really move in or that stay put and this one does on me and hugs me just right. Flawlessly hugs my chest just right that I don't even need to wear a bra. I'm wearing this to feel chic at home where I spend hours working online but feel cute walking to the mailbox! Could totally dress up or down. I'm a little disappointed the buttons are faux and that the black straps pictured weren't included, but I don't need them since I love it braless.
The heavy fabric is great for windy beaches. It didn't flatter my small chest/poofy belly combo, but was cute otherwise.
The fabric on this is heavy! Perfect for a beach dinner/lunch

Wanted to love this top because it's so cute and perfect for transitional weather but a big in the shoulders and sleeves, wish I sized down!!
Super cute but runs big. Sleeves kept falling off my shoulders all night!

I decided to try this to try out the whole puffy sleeve trend, I loved this top. I ordered up a size because it was from Urban and thought it might run smaller. It does not, it runs pretty true to size and I think if I had gotten the XS it would've fit better but the small was wearable and boy did I wear this top a lot.
Love the skirt in the front and shorts in the back. Got a lot of compliments! The top can be adjusted with the tie, so it's able to work for anyone.

links_reviews_title: Cute, maybe a little too young for me
links_reviews_text: This was cute, but at (a young at heart!) 40 felt maybe a little too young for me. I'm normally a 2-4, XS/S and here the S was fine but even on the small side.
I could not zip this. The material feels like paper. It would definitely be too baggy if I sized up, but going to the bathroom would be impossible with how tight the area that zips is.
Loved the colors however had a hard time filling out the chest which made it look a little weird. M was the perfect (shorter) length for 5’7”. Wore out while on vacation.
very cute! It looked exactly how I thought it would.
Very cute for a summertime picnic. A tad short, but worked well for the weekend!
I'm tall so always struggle with romper torso length - this one gave me a bit of a wedgie but could wear it.

Great for a night in a beach town in the summer. Loved that it was a skort; made it so fun to wear. Unfortunately rompers can be so uncomfortable. links_reviews_title: cute but too loose on top.

at first i couldn't even get this skirt up my thighs (and i ripped it a lil bit, sorry nuuly!!!), but with pantyhose and ~*dedication*~ it fit! the underlayer was pretty snug, so i rode it up a little so i could walk and sit freely. it's a really cute skirt, but be sure to size up or wear it with some spanx if you're a curvy gal like me

I'm glad i read the reviews before renting and sized up. I got a lot of compliments on the skirt and it goes with a lot so I might be purchasing this skirt to own! There is zero stretch to the material and the lining is a bit scratchy but not noticeable enough to not wear it. It's a winner!

Absolutely love it but the first layer the slip was really too tight I couldn’t sit down:/ SO CUTE THOUGH SO MUCH POTENTIAL. I MEAN LOOK AT THE PHOTO I WANT TO WEAR IT. Just couldn’t sit down. Goddamn. Love you guys though.
I wore this to an event and out and about!

Love this item and the style along with quality were great but it’s super small in the hips area. I wish it did fit but for those with curvy hips, I wouldn’t recommend this. There’s zero stretch in it.

So cute, but runs very small :(

Pretty

links_reviews_title: Throwback to the 60s, high waisted and button fly, but with a twist in the shorter length.

Size down, runs large in the waist and hips
These were too short for me to wear in the winter but cute.
I ordered an XS but they were still too big.

These pants are oh so stretchy and comfy for such a highrise! I wish i would have sized down! I think they would have fit better just a tad bit tighter! Still super super cute!
Loose all over and ran too large.

links_reviews_title: Cute but runs large, specially for petities

Very comfortable regardless and I did receive a couple compliments for the style.

links_reviews_title: These are really cute! I run between a medium and a large and went with the large. I wish I had gone with the medium. Also I’m 5’4- I wish they were just the tiniest bit longer. They hit at my ankles but it felt weird... they needed that extra inch. Other than that, I loved them.
links_reviews_text: I wore them with a fitted flower tee tucked in- very 70s and cute.
If you are hourglass shaped this is perfect for you, if you have a straight athletic body like me you won’t fill it out right. Totally bummed it didn’t work!

I have been searching for cropped wide-leg jeans that would look good on a shorter curvier girl and finally found them! These were the perfect, most comfortable, fit I have tried on. They accentuated all the right parts of my legs and hit my waist in the perfect spot. Very easy to dress up and down and great for multiple wears.
Love these pants! The fit is true to size and I like the capri look. They're pretty stretchy too, so I can see the sizing being flexible
Got so many compliments on these jeans! Such a cute style and flare. Fit perfectly and were really comfy.

These pants are super cute and clearly really high quality. I usually wear an S and they ran a little bit large, but nothing some stacked heels couldn't fix. I will say that these pants run kind of long for more petite frames (I'm 5'2), so you don't really get the effect you see on the model, but they were so cute with a crop top that I can forgive that :p. Capulet, please make more petite sizes!

I loved these jeans so much that I bought them! They fit me very well and were also incredibly comfortable. It's a good medium weight denim and the silhouette is especially good for the summertime. The high-waist on the denim made me feel sucked in and secure (in a good way) in the tummy while rest of the style fell away from the body making it nice and light.
The sizing ran large and due to the fact that it’s a thin denim fabric, it was overall unforgiving and unflattering on my frame.

links_reviews_title: Didn't work with my body shape
links_reviews_text: I ended up getting a large based on the reviews, and the pants fit well. I thought they were a bit too wide legged (too much fabric), though--perhaps the medium would have had a better leg shape for my body type. Cute for someone else for sure!
I really liked these pants! I listened to other reviews and rented the large, which was a perfect choice. I would definitely rent them again.
this green is SO good. Petite girls- you know the drill... hits lower on the ankle but still flattering. Well constructed. Best fabric on earth. Enough give to be comfortable but not slouchy.

These pants were so great, I bought them. I am a charcoal skinny jeans wearing everyday kind of gal so I was really pushing myself to try these. I got so many compliments and realized just how many places I could wear these. These are brunch jeans, work jeans, baby shower jeans, clean your garage on Sunday jeans. They go with everything and I didn't feel like an uber hippie wearing them. Love them!
I'm size 8 and the Large barely fit! What! I will still be wearing them, but if I want to eat a big meal that won't work.

These pants are super cute. Loved the high waist. I'm long waisted and they still came above my belly button. I just couldn't figure out how to style them in this cold Minnesota weather so I didn't end up wearing them.
These fit great! I have a long torso and shorter legs so pants are difficult for me to find. The high waist and length worked well for me. I purchased!

links_reviews_title: Added subtle flare to casual outfit
links_reviews_text: I haven't tried a pair of pants with this wide of a leg before and I'm so glad I gave them a shot. They were the perfect thing to add a little something extra to a casual outfit. They had a great flare without being overwhelming and the material was super comfy to move in and wear all day while grabbing lunch and shopping around Oahu. They are pretty high-waisted, but even with a shorter torso like I have they totally worked great paired a cropped/tied top!

But the waist was so tight I could not button them up comfortably. I'm a 12 and carry a little bit more weight in my waistline. I think the 14 would have fit my waist but would be too big in the leg.
I normally wear a size medium (sz 6) in pants. Unfortunately these were too tight in the waist.

links_reviews_title: Maybe I Just Don't Know My Size, But
links_reviews_text: They were a bit big! They fit in the waist very well but otherwise saggy and sad. Wanted to love -- very well made and super cute, but also pretty long for me, and I'm 5'5, as well as difficult to pair with a top. Will be trying again in a different size!

I was skeptical of jeans that come in XS/S/M/L, but these fit perfectly! I normally wear a 23 and am therefore sized out of most of the jeans on Nuuly. So, FWIW, these may work for you if you're a 23! I will definitely be borrowing more from this brand.
I felt like this is a good versatile piece to rent. Wore them to work and out
Ordered one size up based on review and still could barely squeeze into
Luckily ordered in both small and medium, the medium was much more comfortable.

I styled them with really feminine blouses and sandals, but would look great with a tee and jeans too. Also, I'm 5'1" and they were a great length, so definitely petite friendly!

links_reviews_title: Nice color! A little long for Petite sizes.

links_reviews_title: Cute but TIGHT on the waist/ribs

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: For the most part, I loved these overalls. I was so close to purchasing them, but stopped myself because they were a bit too long in the inseam. I wore them multiple times throughout the month and received a lot of compliments.
Fits as expected

links_reviews_title: My favorite item in my Nuuly
links_reviews_text: I LOVE THESE! They fit perfectly and having more buttons up the side makes them even more flattering and able to move around in - they don't bunch up around the sides like standard overalls. The legs are a little bit cropped since I'm tall, but I like them that way. Definitely getting these again!

links_reviews_title: fun overalls, but a big long.
links_reviews_text: the material is thick and durable denim. the pant legs are more straight, less shapely than i'd like. i found that all the side buttons made for a lengthy process of putting on and off. i have a long torso and long legs, but found that even tightening the straps all the way in the medium left me with a slightly baggy crotch -- so i'd recommend sizing down if able. otherwise, pockets were deep & great and these would be a very cute fashion overall if the sizing was a little more true.

OBSESSED!! I was not sure about sizing on these because I have an athletic body but I went with a medium. It was a little large but nothing too crazy. Could probably have gone with a small. These have stretch in them which made them SUPER comfy. If you are taller, these might be cropped on you. They were a tad long on me.

Really liked this piece. The embroidery really spices up the usual Jean jacket look. Needed something warmer where I'm at so didn't get to wear it much, but would definitely get again. Fit well. And could be dressed up or down because of the design.

I was looking for something fun and different for the fall and this did it. I wore with black jeans, dresses, leggings. It fit perfectly!
The embroidery was beautiful, but I found myself not wearing it because the jacket is so stiff

I really liked this piece! I had to wear it with a high waisted skirt or pants. If you're tall or long torso, definitely order a medium for length, but it fit everywhere else. This jacket dressed things up - more of an olive color in person but still loved!
Love this jacket, it's very unique and classy. The arms are long which worked well for me. I got compliments all day long at my event!
This shirt got a lot of attention. The color and silk is beautiful. However, the sleeves were too long and the shirt was too long for me. It was more of an oversized look but still cute.
This was a great piece to dress up or down.

I loved this jacket. The material and design is so beautiful. Definitely a deep olive tone (not as gold as it looks in the picture). I got so many compliments and considered buying it. If you are looking for a fun winter/going-out jacket, this is it!

I only ended up wearing this once but I loved it! It is a super cool color and style and I got a lot of compliments. I thought it looked great open or zipped up. This is a great example of a more trendy style that I wouldn't necessarily want to own but fun to rent.
I love this jacket. Light weight and made it easy to dress up a look to make it more fashionable.

I think this is a cute top but just a little to fussy for my style. I am also very tall and it was a little too short. Fabric also wasn’t super comfortable. It was the only thing in my box that i didn’t wear.

I really loved this jacket. I got several compliments on it. It stood out and I really liked the arms. Flowy, but not overboard. The bow, since it’s silk, didn’t want to stay tied. That was the most annoying part. But I was tempted to purchase this item!
Love it. The arms are great, good volume without being toooo much.. Paired with Meryl Cropped Wide leg jean, looks great.

This dress is adorable, I wish I could have worn it out! Tried this one several times, fit is great, cut is flattering. Perfect breezy summer dress, will try and rent again when I can wear it in public!

links_reviews_title: a bit too long for me
links_reviews_text: This dress had a lot of potential, but the length was just weird on me. It cuts somewhere a little too close to the knee to be a mini dress, and it was unflattering. If you're into that sort of thing, this might be the dress for you. Just not my fave.
It’s perfect. I love the puff sleeves and the bust. It’s so flattering on the waist but is nice and loose around the upper legs and thighs.

A dress perfect for spring and summer of vacation. I made the mistake of ordering a XS because I was afraid anything more would be too long but I wish I would of stuck to my original size S. It was a little tight but nonetheless cute and it’s a casual dress to wear with sandals or sneakers and it stops at above the knee.
This dress is very cute and dainty but just has a very awkward length to it, never felt cute enough in it to wear it out!! So very cute up top but was just too long for me!
Fit perfect, loved the puff sleeves. Very cute summer dress.

Love this dress! It was so feminine and flattering. Easy to dress up or down, I will be making great use of it while I can. I love it so much I might buy it, reminds me of Reformation but so much more affordable.

I think in a different fabric this would have been better.

Loved the print. But ran a little tight with very little give in the fabric

links_reviews_title: A bit like wearing your Mom's jeans
links_reviews_text: The leg is full and definitely relaxed but the waist is very high and runs small. Cute slit detailing on the leg but overall very matronly looking.
True to Size. Runs narrow in the waist

I love these jeans. They are a fun twist on your typical boyfriend jean. They were a bit long in the leg because I have shorter legs but fit great in the thigh. Pretty big gap around my waist but that can be typical of jeans for me. Always wore them with a belt and still loved them. I'm buying them. Note: i'm a 26 in madewell jeans and got a 26 for these.
when you first put these pants on, the fit like a glove. But after an hour or so, I was swimming in them. They definitely stretch out big time.
cute styling but a very full cut.

These shorts, while very high rise are longer than they look on the model and the color is darker. I wore them with a white crop top on vacation. If you're in between sizes (I'm usually a 2/4), size down!
Brought on vacation. Perfect w/ white kicks, esp for sightseeing. Considering buying bc I don’t want to part with them.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but did not fit
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit me in the waist. Great color though!
I am usually between a 6 and 8 and I went with the 8 and I'm glad I did. I think these would look good on any body type/shape. Something different than your average summer short so I say go for it!
These were perfect and very comfy. i only got to wear them once but I loved them and would definitely order them again!

links_reviews_title: Versatile shorts to live in for august
links_reviews_text: Great for everything in the summer, chores, casual dinner out, around the house. Styled w crop tops or tucked in tanks. Fit perfect and very flattering for hourglass/ larger bummed girls.
Fits as expected
This was so cute but was far too big on me, ended up wearing an oversized sweater over to make it look like a skirt which was a good solution!

links_reviews_title: Color is perfect, fit is very boxy
links_reviews_text: I loved the color, the cropped length is perfect. But the sleeves were very long on me, almost to my elbow. If they were just a tad shorter, I would have kept it. Overall very well made and I did wear it a few times but didn’t fall in love.
Really enjoyed this top! Dressed it up for a meeting and was also able to wear with crop pants and vans. Material is a bit stiff but I was a fan. Quality top
Nothing special. Very light fabric that I unfortunately sweat through.

Great option to test out the crop top trend. I paired it with high waisted slacks and it was a fun way to still be in business casual. The photos make it look like it’s a gold color, but it’s more green/chartreuse.
I would only order this with the matching pants! I’m not a crop top person but it worked and covered nicely for the overall outfit! Wore to a professional work event and got lots of compliments!

I loved wearing this top for casual office meetings, brunch and low key outings. Fabulous color and comfortable to wear. If you like sleeves, this is a great option with nice cut - short but not cropped too high.

lovvvvvvved the color but the fit is just slightly off, tight in the shoulders and not as cropped on me as in photo. i know its a rental but the top (along with 2 other pieces in my shipment) felt VERY loved, if you know what I mean.

I was so excited about this top. I bought a dress from this brand last month that was beautiful so I had high hopes. The top I got was more greenish than the yellow that showed on my screen. It was also really small, like crushing my boobs, I can't breathe, it may not come off small.
I absolutely loved this top. The color was gorgeous and I wore it multiple times over the holidays. To family parties! To the bars!
I really wanted to like this for the color and cropped fit, but it was too cropped for me to wear with my work clothes and the sleeves too large. It also seemed more appropriate for spring or summer.

This is definitely an olive colored top, not the yellow tone that it looks like in pictures! Didn't mind the color variation, but the top was also quite thin (the picture made it look more structured) and overall I didn't feel like it was SO innovative/fashion forward that I should've used one of my rental picks on it. I wore it to work and with jeans and it was easy to dress up or down, but overall just felt like a pretty simple shirt.
Length was perfect. The color was different than in the pictures but I still liked it. Just couldn't wear it because it was way too tight in the bust.
Loved the structured, boxy look to this top. Looked great with my high waisted skirts and pants!
Sleeves are slightly puffier in real life. Material is very classy and dressed up jeans. I was worried it would be too bright for my pale skin, but it was a super flattering bright green/yellow.
Loved this so much! The bright, warm color was a perfect transition top. I wore it with skirts, high-waisted jeans, and so many more things! Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but not for wearing all day.
links_reviews_text: This top was super cute! The sleeves are so unique and I love the way the shape looked on my body. The only issue I had was I wore it all day to work in and I felt like I couldn’t stop sweating. Thankfully it didn’t show sweat marks clearly but I was worried about that the entire time. So my consensus; cute top, but maybe just for date night.
Beautiful fabric and drape -- Color is more of an olive color vs. mustard as shown in the photo. Would be great for fall! Fun cropped shape and unique shoulder detailing -- super cute!
Fits as expected

I tried this on and was immediately kicking myself for not reading reviews. This top is very cute and well made but long waisted girls be warned, it’s also very cropped. Would be a super cute casual outfit with high waisted jeans. Wish I could have worn it!

This was super cute, and I got some compliments on it. It looked best with high-waisted skinny jeans. It was a little short and showed my belly button off and on. Probably more of a Saturday/casual wear than a work wear item.
I did love this shirt but it is incredibly cropped - above my bellybutton cropped. Since it was too cropped, I didn't end up wearing up as it's winter and it felt too inappropriate
This is a great versatile piece.
This was super cute, however it was very hard to keep it from wrinkling. Even after ironing, 20 minutes of wear left me with wrinkles. However, that's what you get with linen.
Rad cut, interesting design, comfortable and professional-looking for work. I will likely buy this piece to keep. Really impressed with both the Eve Gravel pieces I've rented.

This shirt is so cute, I wanted to love it. It was too tight for my size 12 apple shaped body. It was very difficult to get the shirt over my shoulders and was skin tight around my size 38C bust. Beautiful but only if you don't carry any weight in your upper body / midsection.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy, breathable material. Just the right length- not too cropped not too long.
links_reviews_text: Paired with white high waisted jeans with a frayed hem and nude heels (made for a perfect business casual outfit!) and a white tote.

Really cute shirt. Paired with white high waisted jeans. It fit great and I only gave it four stars because it was a itchy. I expected it to be itchy since it is linen but I think the summer heat made it more itchy on me. Overall very cute

links_reviews_title: A little big if you are petite
links_reviews_text: I ordered a small and found it to be a little big in the arms. I am petite but don't always wear petite tops. In this case I feel like the petite would work better. I cuffed the sleeves and it looks better that way for me.

links_reviews_title: The Shirt You Should Live In This Summer!
links_reviews_text: I wore this blouse on what felt like the hottest day of the summer and i'm so glad I did! It's made from a linen + cotton blend so it's lightweight and breathable but not see through. It's just barely cropped and sits at the waist, i'm obsessed!
Pattern was so cute but the waistband kept curling up, making the fit a bit questionable

links_reviews_title: Cute but looked a little worn
links_reviews_text: This was adorable. Exactly how you would imagine a flowy cute skirt for that effortless look. But this looked a little worn and it was not very easy to get the wrinkles out
great outfit made with this one!

I only wore this once as the silhouette of these style skirts are not the most flattering on my body type especially in the mid section. However I wore it to work with an oversized white sweat and booties and got so many compliments!!!

+ the fabric wasn't sheer, print was nice - terrible, cheap fit - the seems were bumpy all the way up. Not friendly to hips - the waist is a tiny elastic with virtually no structure. I wanted to roll up the skirt to make it feel at least a bit more tailored Overall, pretty disappointed in the quality of the skirt. Waste of a selection.
I had a lot of fun styling this one, was fantastic and fun. I bias cut fit a little funny on me, but may work better for more "pear" shapes. Still highly recommend!
The fit of this skirt is all wrong. Yes it is cut on the bias, but it was pulling/snagging in all the wrong places. I tried to wear it but took it off every time- would not recommend. :(
This skirt can be really worn with anything: up or down. I'm usually a 6 but got a 4 and it fit perfectly so I would definitely size one down. This may be one I need to keep!

links_reviews_title: True to size, but I had to size up
links_reviews_text: If I were to put this in my bag again I would definitely wait until I could get the 6. The 8 fit, but it was definitely on the verge of being noticeably big. I styled it similarly to how the model did since the skirt is the statement piece!

I wore this skirt to work with a blush tee and got so many compliments! Since it's bias cut, the sizing if flexible. I got a 4 to fit my waist and it fit my hips perfectly too (I'm usually a 6 on bottom). It's incredibly silky and the fabric is substantial enough that it's not see-through like some other slip skirts I've tried. Could easily throw this on with a silk top and heels to dress it up, or with a sweatshirt for the weekend -- it's surprisingly versatile! It was a little wrinkled when it arrived but I hung it up for a few days before wearing and all the creases were gone.

I rented this jumpsuit and something fun to romp around in while socially distancing. It completely lived up to the fun! It has a hip vintage feel, and is incredibly comfortable. The denim is so soft! While I haven’t seen any of my friends in person for two months, they went wild for it on social media. 10/10 would rent again!
Comfortable, sexy, it's a dream. Rented it twice because I regretted not buying it the first time.
Cute
I was only able to wear this once, but it was so cute! It fit really well and was true to size. got a ton of compliments on it!

I thought this wouldn’t fit me, but it fits perfectly. It is tight but not uncomfortable. I’m not self conscious in it and it makes me feel sexy. My friends compliment it and all ask “omg, is this vintage”. Considering buying

This jumpsuit was a pleasant surprise! I was concerned how it would fit on top, because I am busty (34DD), but it fit like a glove! It's also stretchy, so the comfort level is awesome. I wore it to a wedding shower and got a ton of compliments. I am 5 foot 6, and the length was perfect with heels. Highly recommend if you are looking for something fun and different.
Maybe I'll buy it. So much fun to wear. Flattering and comfortable.

I ordered two jumpsuits and this one is by far the winner. It is BEYOND comfortable and flattering. Gives me an awesome waist and my butt looks SO GOOD. Tell all your friends to get this jumpsuit. Worth. IT. I thought it was even better than the more expensive Stoned Immaculate jumpsuit.
People just don't know what to do about these sexy coveralls! It's like I'm ready to do work... But daaamn. Also, stretchy in all the right ways. You can move in them.

links_reviews_title: So comfy, fits like a glove
links_reviews_text: I love this cozy jumpsuit. It is made of thick denim with lots of stretch so you can wear it all day and b cute and comfy!

I love the idea. Material was super comfy - thick and stretchy. It fit well lengthwise in the torso, but way too long for my average length legs. And there was no way to really roll them up due to them being looser at the bottom. I also felt like the waist was maybe stretched out on the one I got because it was way loose on me in the center, yielding more of a mechanic than sexy jumpsuit vibe.
I wasn't sure how this would look on me, but I think it can be flattering on any body type! It was also surprisingly comfortable and looked awesome with white boots.

This jumpsuit was amazing - and I hardly ever say that about jumpsuits. It fit like a glove and was stretchy. It was the perfect length although I woulnt have minded if it was just a TAD longer so I could wear taller heels, but otherwise it was perfect.

This jumpsuit is so cool! I got a lot of compliments and it is SUPER flattering (surprisingly)! It is tight but very stretchy. I'm 5'8 and it fit me well in the legs and torso. Will rent again I'm sure!
Was a little short on me, but perfect flare. Stretchy jean material. Was form fitting on me and got many compliments! Other than the inseam length, was amazing jumpsuit!!
The waist was a little tight, the medium JUST fit me, but it was very flattering and I loved it. It was warm and comfortable and fun for lots of different occasions.

This jumper is so much fun to wear!! Will definitely make you feel sexy and confident. Love that you can zip the front as low as want (wink wink). Only downside is because my torso is short, it didn’t fit as show in the pic - it bunched up a little. And if I wasn’t walking around in heels than I was stepping on the bottom flare. If you are 5’ like me, only wear it when you are going out in heels, than take it off so you don’t step on the pants haha

links_reviews_title: Snug in all the right places
links_reviews_text: I am obsessed with this jumper. The proportions are perfect but it could definitely run long on someone with shorter legs. It hugged all the right places and was incredibly comfortable for denim. I wore it to a concert and a few bars around town and got so many compliments. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a fit that makes them feel like a rockstar.

Guys. Seriously. This is so flattering and hugs all your right curves, in all their right places. Who knew 70s fashion could make you feel like such a fox? I got tons of compliments on it and my boyfriend was drooling whenever I wore it. Because it's freezing in NYC, I was able to wear ankle stockings underneath it and stayed really warm. That probably worked for the best anyway - its tight enough to show underwear lines. Wearing stockings meant no visibility.
I’m usually a small but the medium fit great! I also added a belt because the elastic wasn’t super flattering.
I love this jumpsuit. Perfect length for 5'9, very comfortable, and fit like a glove.
This is a great fit but it's form-fitted. Too short for gals like me with long legs.
If you’re tall like me 5’9, this looked really cute with the bottom cuffed like 80s/90s style. Wore with some rose gold kicks & I was set for the night out!!
Wasn't for me.
Love this jumpsuit. Soooo comfy and easy. Fit perfectly & very flattering.
Fun jumpsuit!

This jumpsuit hit all the marks - great fit, easy to wear, and tons of compliments. The embroidery detailing gives it a cool vintage look. Zipper makes it a breeze to wear. The medium fit me great - I’m 5’9” - but could be a tad long for shorter gals. Definitely may end up buying this one!
This jumpsuit was flattering and fun. I got lots of compliments when I wore it. Great for fall. I am 5'10" and it was the perfect length.

This jumpsuit fits like a glove and is extremely flattering. It has a pretty tight fit, but the fabric is thick/stretchy and kind of shapes your body really nicely so it doesn’t feel too revealing or anything. Will probably end up buying or renting this piece again.
This fit perfect every where, except the legs were VERY long on me. I just cuffed the bottoms and it still looked super cute, but just a heads up

I am 5'9 and this was long enough for me to wear with short booties. So if you are my height- YES it is long enough! If you are shorter it will fit perfectly with some cute booties or heels. super flattering!
Favorite piece I rented. Great quality, runs a little small but I am tall so could contribute.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, not for long torsos
links_reviews_text: Super cute. I love this. After reading the reviews I was so hopeful that the torso would be long enough. Runs a little small. Would recommend sizing up.

I am completely in love with this jumpsuit. I wasn't sure with sizing and figured I would be either a L or XL and went with the XL and am glad I did! I thought it fit my shape really well and hugged my curves. It really accentuated the waist! I had to wear some heels with it because it was slightly too long but I'm in love and will probably buy this.
really only good for tall people - not recommended for anyone under 5'4"

links_reviews_title: Stretchy denim, but not flattering if you have a tummy
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is made of stretchy denim, so it fit me, however I am more straight-waisted and it wasn't super flattering on my mid section since it has an elastic waist. I ended up styling it un-zipped to the waist, with a graphic tank underneath, which then allowed it to not pull as tight thought the middle. If you have more of an hourglass shape, I would think this would fit a lot better. As for length, I'm 5'7" and can wear this with chunky 2" heels. They were a little long to just wear with flats unless you're ok with them bunching a bit at the ankle.

links_reviews_title: Almost Too Tight but Totally Worth It!
links_reviews_text: I was worried that this would show off my love handles but instead, it held me in accented my silhouette. It was a tad bit short for my long torso and tight but not enough to not fit and the denim gave as I wore it longer. They are so fun and distinctive but also versatile.

This is a super cute denim jumpsuit! It has a 70s vibe. The cute front pockets and flair wide legs add to the cuteness. The straps are adjustable and would be cute crisscrossed. I wore fitted shirts under the jumpsuit and dressed it down with high top Vans and dressed it up with heels. The pants legs are long. It was fit really cute!

It was comfortable and cute from the waist up. I thought my butt looked weird because the pockets are SO far up the backside. My cheeks looked long. Also the legs on this are ridiculously long. I'm 5'8" and I wore a small, and I still had to wear huge chunky heels with these and they STILL hit the ground!
I needed the next size up. Really cute jumpsuit and loved the braided pocket detail.

This jumpsuit hugs tight but had enough stretch where so it is comfy and wearable. If you are long waisted this might hit a bit weird and definitely long for those under 5’5” Probably the most flattering piece I have rented (and the purchased) on Nuuly to date!

These were very form-fitting and cute, but the size of the quite-long bell bottoms mean they’re a summer wear, or at least not to be worn with any amount of weather. And it could have been that they were a tad snug, but the well-made fabric that was meant to cover the thick shiny silver silver at the side laid agape when zipped, which made it look a little “mall” / cheapy. Certainly cute, though!
Long torso like me… It is difficult to find a jumpsuit that fits. This piece is it like a charm! I am 5’8”… 140 pounds with a big bust. It really felt absolutely perfect on ... Loved!
Fun to wear and cute~

I really liked these and considered buying them. They fit like a glove and are extremely flattering. They have just enough of a stylized vibe without feeling stuffy or overly put together. Would recommend highly.

I can almost never wear rompers because I have a long torso, but this fit like a dream. It was hard not to buy it. Great length too! Wore it with a white tank and also a tight fighting long sleeve tee. Paired with platform sneakers once and cowboy boots another time. Worked with both!

I loved this jumper and it went well with a lot of tops. It’s very fitted, so you need to make sure your tops aren’t long otherwise they bunch up underneath and you can see it. I’m a little smaller on top than on bottom, so it was a little big on top, but not as much as other jumpers I’ve worn.

Super cute, but very long. I'm 5'8" and had to wear really tall heels for it not to drag on ground and pool around the ankles. I really wanted to wear this more casually on many occasions, but unless you're 5'10"+ you'll have to wear heels. With heels it was so flattering and cute.
I LOVED this jumpsuit, it looked so good on and fit perfectly. The only problem was that I'm 5'3" and it was about 2.5" too long even with platforms :(

I love this jumpsuit!! I wore it with a short sleeve shite top underneath for a shift at free people (I am a stylist there). It is a great fit for a tall woman (I am 5'10). I was worried it wouldn't be long enough, but it was. True to size as well. Very 70s.

I loved these overalls! I only wore them a couple times. Because they were so long, I had to roll them up and I was worried they looked dorky that way. But when I decided to wear them out, I got so many compliments. The fit was really flattering. I wore them with a cropped top, so the shirt wouldn’t be too bunch under the overalls and it worked great. I will rent these again, despite needing to roll the pants.

I usually need a 34ish inch inseam for a full length fit and these were perfecto. I don't like the showing ANY type of bra strap and did not have room in the fitted torso area for full length tank/top. Purchased a bra/half tank from Target, "colsie" brand in the color "smart blue"which matched the dark denim perfectly and allowed me to go bra-less under this thicker denim with no extra fabric stuff/bunched into the torso. Seriously considered purchasing...will likely rent again!
Very cute! I’m 5”3 and this is way too long. It did fit around my chest 34DD no bra. Too form fitting for me but stretchy.
Not good for shorter people
I wish I was a little bit taller... it's very long in the leg

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: This babe of a jumpsuit was 💯 in my book!! I felt so good in this cute jumpsuit. I usually don’t wear a lot of flared bottoms, but this jumpsuit really made me just wanna dance with how good they made me feel. My bootie looked awesome and I just felt confident. Such a great feeling when you try on an outfit.

Everything is right about this jumpsuit: It is soft, fits a taller build, and is truly flattering. I wore it to work, on a date night-literally any occasion I could find. It is slightly stretchy, so keep in mind it does stretch out a little as you wear it-but nothing annoying. It is perfect for anyone who deals with being tall and having to wonder if a jumpsuit will be long enough. Don't worry-the length is PERFECT.

Seriously, love this jumpsuit! I am pretty tall so I was really skeptical of it actually fitting well, but it fit me like a dang glove. I've dressed it up and down and have worn it both to work and out on the weekends, and I've got so many compliments! It's also crazy comfy. Would definitely warn you if you're on the shorter side, since it fit me so well and I'm just under 6 foot, but it really is amazing.

This jumpsuit is insanely cute, I just made the mistake of ordering a size up. The material is already stretchy so it just looked baggy on me and the legs are extra long (and i'm pretty tall). Regardless of how tall you are I think you'd have to wear some kind of platform because it truly is quite long.
Fits as expected. Tighter in the bust
This jumper is really cute; however, for the shorties out there expect to roll up the pant legs a bit (it's ok tho - it still looks cute that way). Plus, POCKETS - 4 of them.

links_reviews_title: Was a perfect fit for my body type
links_reviews_text: I ordered this in a Medium. I am typically a size 6 and thought it might fit a little big in the waist, or be too short in the torso. But I was pleasantly surprised! It fit my torso and hugged my body perfectly. It is definitely for tall girls -- I am 5'9" and had to wear 3" high clogs with it to keep the pants off the ground. However, the long legs definitely made it more flattering. I felt it stretch out a bit throughout the day (especially in the waist/hips) and I'm curious how the fit might change if it went through the wash and shrank a bit. I would be inclined to buy this to keep if it wasn't so expensive :/ Overall (ha!) I loved it and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Long in legs, but great with heels
links_reviews_text: Definitely long in the legs, but was perfect with heels. Could've maybe sized down but it fit :)

links_reviews_title: Very cute! Wore them a lot.
links_reviews_text: These are so cute and they really make any outfit. Also, true to size.
made my short figure look a little frumpy but i tried to make it work by rolling up the bottoms. i would definitely go for an XS if you're in between sizes. short girls beware!!

links_reviews_title: loved these, will be better for summer
links_reviews_text: These were very comfortable and not see through as I feared they may be. Will be renting again once its warmer

Seriously such a great find. I saw a blogger wear them awhile back and they looked so good on her so when I saw them in Nuuly I decided to order them. So happy I did. Both for great casual outfits and “going out” outfits. Super comfy and very flattering. I could of ordered a small but the medium is great and lays perfectly. I get so many compliments when I wear them. Don’t miss out on these!

links_reviews_title: Took a risk and very happy I did
links_reviews_text: I was a little bit nervous to try this paper bag pant trend... but I figured why not try it as a rental! I have wide hips so I thought they might look bad, but they were actually my favorite item in my nuuly this month!

links_reviews_title: Loved, wore many times, but not flattering on butt
links_reviews_text: I wore several times to casual day to day activities. Was stopped many time for compliments from women. 🙃 I will say the butt looks better if you have a longer jacket over to break it up. I almost bought but worse so much decided to find something new.

I sized down because I was afraid of them looking ridiculous, but they run v true to size. I was still able to wear but would have been more comfy in my true size. they are comfy but still make your outfit feel put together. the waist is adjustable and the cropped length is perfect.

These pants were overall pretty good and cute, but they definitely run large and fit a little strangely. I am usually between a small and medium and I ordered a small in these pants and that was definitely the right choice. They still had a little room in them, making the butt area not the most flattering. Still wore them to work a couple of times and really liked them!

I just received my box a week ago and I've already worn these three times! They are easy to dress up or down. I wore them with a bodysuit to go out to dinner, a blouse for work, and a t-shirt for the weekend. The waist is stretchy and the legs have a really relaxed fit so I think I could have gone down a size or up a size and still really loved these. Thinking about buying them!!
I had high hopes but size 28 was too small around the hips and 29 was baggy in the legs. Oh well!
These are wonderful but ran small for me. I will definitely order again and size up!
Fits as expected. Button closure at bottom makes more a narrower leg opening

This jeans were great. These were my first pair of jeans to rent and I'm now sold on renting more. They weren't as high waisted as I thought they would be but they were definitely super cute and fun to have. I'm 5'3 with a short torso and the length of these jeans was perfect, they hit about 1" above my ankle.
Will be renting this one again.

I have been wearing these jeans nonstop and I think I'll probably buy them! They are so flattering, comfortable, and perfect shape. I sized up, per other reviews and they fit well. They do stretch a tad bit, so if you like them snug your regular size might fit too. The hem on mine was a lot more raw than shown in the photos, but I actually really liked it. It gave them a super casual feel. They hit just above my ankle bone for that almost cropped, but not too cropped look. 10/10 would recommend!

These are great classic jeans! They fit slightly on the smaller size, but overall they are pretty true to size. Would have liked them to be a little higher waisted. However, they still looked good after tops were tucked in.
10000% buying these jeans. It's so hard to find a pair of jeans that fit in all the right places and I just couldn't pass up the chance to keep these year round!
These jeans are it. Throw away all of your other jeans. So comfortable and the perfect mix between relaxed but also form fitting.
Loved them—going to buy them I think. Hard to find jeans that I felt this good in. I like jeans that don’t give & enjoyed the slightly frayed hem.
These jeans were great, but I am glad I sized up. The waist was a little big but the thigh area was just a little snug. Still so cute and comfy, got a couple compliments on them!
LOVE these jeans! I love BlankNYC sweaters and jackets but I had never tried any of their jeans. I will definitely be buying these jeans!
Never got to wear these because they were slightly too tight.
I sized up in these after other reviews mentioned them running small, and they fit perfectly! They're really flattering & comfortable, and go with a lot of outfits.
I wish I bought these puppies! Unfortunately, I returned them because I didn’t think I needed anymore jeans. They fit me perfectly! I could live in them! Felt cute might return later!!

links_reviews_title: Never wore - ordered the wrong size
links_reviews_text: Size was much too small, never even tried to put these on. They look very cute in person though and seem like good material, just wish I ordered a larger size.

links_reviews_title: Really cute, just ran too small.
links_reviews_text: Would've loved, just ran small for this brand. I own a size 25 in one of their other cuts, but the 26 in this one was way too small.
These jeans were a bit big, so paired them with a belt and a tucked in shirt! They looked really cute with platform sneakers and booties!
These were great, they fit like a glove. Definitely true to size. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is that they are a little lower waisted than I would have liked.

I'm someone who is very particular with denim and these jeans were a 10/10! Extremely flattering and true to size. I went back and forth about buying them in my head probably 100 times. I've never worn jeans from Blank NYC, but these were some of my favorite jeans I've EVER worn. Perfect for work or just casually. Seriously LOVE these jeans

links_reviews_title: Not for me, or at least not in summer.

It's still a really cute shirt nonetheless.
